categories.name: Testing
details: ✅ Unit tests present for core components (ExpenseForm, ExpenseList)

recommendations: Add testID attributes to all interactive elements for better testing
Implement loading states for form submissions and data operations
Add empty state UI when no expenses are present
Enhance error handling with user-friendly error messages
Add ARIA labels and improve chart accessibility
Consider memoizing chart component to prevent unnecessary re-renders
Add unit tests for storage utilities and chart component
Implement input sanitization for form data
Add more comprehensive edge case testing
blockers: Missing accessibility features (testID attributes, ARIA labels)
Lack of proper error state handling for users
Incomplete test coverage for critical components
